helldivers2:data.helldivers2:Name: Tectonic Drill
helldivers2:data.helldivers2:Description: The Tectonic Drill Stratagem allows Helldivers to call down a drill when at a suitable Payload Site. Helldivers must insert a Dark Fluid Vessel inside the drill, and defend it until it can be drilled into the planet. It is event-exclusive, only available in the Deploy Dark Fluid mission.
